text:
Marcelle Manson (born 25 October 1984) is a South African water polo player and field hockey player.
She competed for the South Africa women's national field hockey team in the 2014 Women's Hockey World Cup.
She competed for the South Africa women's national water polo team in the 2017 World Aquatics Championships.

annotations.surface_form: South Africa women's national field hockey team
South Africa women's national water polo team
